description:
Top-rated music promoter. She was in love with http://anidb.net/ch14529 [Ray Lovelock]`s best friend before he died. She heard http://anidb.net/ch10993 [Basara]`s song and seemingly felt something. She was once possessed by http://anidb.net/ch43707 [Sivil].
Source: http://macross.anime.net/wiki/Akiko_Hojo
name: Houjou Akiko
